usage.cn: "现在的梦想决定着你的将来",所以还是再睡一会吧.
usage.eng: "Your future depends on your dreams." So go to sleep.

usage.cn: 幸福不是取决于外界环境，它由我们的心态来决定。戴尔卡耐基（Dale Carnegie）
usage.eng: Happiness doesn't depend on any external conditions, it is governed by our mental attitude.

usage.cn: 幸福不在于你是谁，你拥有什么，而仅仅在于你自己怎么看待。
usage.eng: Remember happiness doesn't depend upon who you are or what you have; it depends solely on what you think.

usage.cn: 单身不表示一种身份，而是一个词语，用来形容一个人足够强大，已不需要依赖别人就可以生活，并且很会享受生活。
usage.eng: Single is not a status , it is a word that describes a person who is strong enough to live and enjoy life without depending on others.
